law.catch_line: Appeals from decision of State Treasurer.
law.text: Any person dissatisfied with the decision of the State Treasurer or whose claim has not been acted upon within ninety (90) days after its filing may request in writing an administrative hearing that shall be conducted in accordance with the provisions of KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 276, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 21, effective June 16, 1960. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1615.
